languages.text: {n}Когда обнаруженный почтенным магосом прецедент был представлен на диспуте, братьям Ордена Молота не оставалось ничего, кроме как склониться перед волей Эксплораторов.{/n}
{n}When the precedent discovered by the venerable Magos was presented at the arbitration, the monks of the Order of the Hammer had no choice but to bow to the will of the Explorators.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Когда обнаруженный почтенным магосом прецедент был представлен на диспуте, братьям Ордена Молота не оставалось ничего, кроме как склониться перед волей Эксплораторов.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}When the precedent discovered by the venerable magos had been presented at the dispute, the brothers of the Order of the Hammer had no choice but to bow to the will of the Explorators.{/n}

{n}When the precedent discovered by the venerable Magos was presented at the arbitration, the monks of the Order of the Hammer had no choice but to bow to the will of the Explorators.{/n}
{n}When the precedent discovered by the venerable Magos was presented at the arbitration, the monks of the Order of the Hammer had no choice but to bow to the will of the Explorators.{/n}

languages.text: {n}在仲裁期间，可敬的贤者提出了曾经发生过的先例。重锤修会的修士别无选择，只能屈从于开拓者的意愿。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}When the precedent discovered by the venerable Magos was presented at the arbitration, the monks of the Order of the Hammer had no choice but to bow to the will of the Explorators.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}在仲裁期间，可敬的贤者提出了曾经发生过的先例。重锤修会的修士别无选择，只能屈从于开拓者的意愿。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Cuando el venerable magos mostró el precedente que había descubierto en el tribunal, los monjes de la Orden del Martillo solo pudieron aceptar el argumento de los exploradores.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}When the precedent discovered by the venerable Magos was presented at the arbitration, the monks of the Order of the Hammer had no choice but to bow to the will of the Explorators.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Cuando el venerable magos mostró el precedente que había descubierto en el tribunal, los monjes de la Orden del Martillo solo pudieron aceptar el argumento de los exploradores.{/n}

languages.text: {n}由緒あるマゴスによって見つかった先例が仲裁の場で提示されたとき、鉄槌の修道会の坊主たちは、エクスプロレイターの意思に屈する以外、選択肢は残されていなかった。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}When the precedent discovered by the venerable Magos was presented at the arbitration, the monks of the Order of the Hammer had no choice but to bow to the will of the Explorators.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}由緒あるマゴスによって見つかった先例が仲裁の場で提示されたとき、鉄槌の修道会の同胞は、エクスプロレイターの意思に屈する以外、選択肢は残されていなかった。{/n}
{n}由緒あるマゴスによって見つかった先例が仲裁の場で提示されたとき、鉄槌の修道会の同胞は、エクスプロレイターの意思に屈する以外、選択肢は残されていなかった。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Quand le précédent découvert par le vénérable magos est présenté en délibéré, les moines de l'Ordre du Marteau n'ont d'autre choix que de s'incliner face aux Explorators.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}When the precedent discovered by the venerable Magos was presented at the arbitration, the monks of the Order of the Hammer had no choice but to bow to the will of the Explorators.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Quand le précédent découvert par le vénérable magos est présenté en délibéré, les frères et sœurs de l'Ordre du Marteau n'ont d'autre choix que de s'incliner face aux Explorators.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Als der Präzedenzfall, den der ehrenwarte Magos entdeckt hatte, bei dem Schiedsverfahren präsentiert wurde, blieb dem Orden des Hammers nichts anders übrig, als sich dem Willen der Exploratoren zu beugen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}When the precedent discovered by the venerable Magos was presented at the arbitration, the monks of the Order of the Hammer had no choice but to bow to the will of the Explorators.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Als der Präzedenzfall, den der ehrenwarte Magos entdeckt hatte, bei dem Schiedsverfahren präsentiert wurde, blieb dem Orden des Hammers nichts anders übrig, als sich dem Willen der Exploratoren zu beugen.{/n}

{n}Als der Präzedenzfall, den der ehrenwarte Magos entdeckt hatte, bei dem Schiedsverfahren präsentiert wurde, blieb dem Orden des Hammers nichts anders übrig, als sich dem Willen der Exploratoren zu beugen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Muhterem Magos tarafından keşfedilen vaka, tahkim kuruluna sunulduğunda Çekiç Tarikatı keşişlerinin Keşiftörlerin iradesine boyun eğmekten başka şansı kalmadı.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}When the precedent discovered by the venerable Magos was presented at the arbitration, the monks of the Order of the Hammer had no choice but to bow to the will of the Explorators.{/n}
